means: 无需对更高一级权力负责的

sentence.Network_en: She described his remarks as irresponsible, inflammatory and outrageous.
sentence.Network_cn: 她称他的话不负责任、具煽动性且极端无礼。

sentence.Network_en: Many people have an irresponsible attitude towards marriage and relationships.
sentence.Network_cn: 很多人对婚姻与两性关系持一种不负责任的态度。

sentence.Network_en: Thick patchy fog and irresponsible driving were to blame.
sentence.Network_cn: 局部浓雾和驾驶员不负责任是罪魁祸首。

PerfectNetExp.abs: the most irresponsible thing to do is to ., 最不负责任的做法是.

His father is an irresponsible drunkard ., 他父亲是个不负责任的醉汉.

entry.tran: 不负责任的;无责任感的
entry.def: If you describe someone as irresponsible, you are criticizing them because they do things without properly considering their possible consequences.

example.ex: I felt that it was irresponsible to advocate the legalisation of drugs...
example.tran: 我认为鼓吹毒品合法化是不负责任的行为。

example.ex: It would be irresponsible of me not to advise my company to abandon this project...
example.tran: 若我不建议公司放弃这个项目，那我就是不负责任。

means.word_mean: 1. showing lack of care for consequences;

auth_sentence.content: To do so could be irresponsible, Gouty says.
auth_sentence.res_content: To do so could be irresponsible, Gouty says.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: To do so could be irresponsible, Gouty says.

auth_sentence.content: Her essay...was infested with 'mere, irresponsible silliness.'
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Her essay...was infested with 'mere, irresponsible silliness.'

auth_sentence.content: It is irresponsible and in my opinion, intentional.
auth_sentence.res_content: It is irresponsible and in my opinion, intentional.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It is irresponsible and in my opinion, intentional.

sentences.en: The mischief arose from irresponsible gossip.
sentences.cn: 这种不幸的事是因无聊的闲话而引起的。

sentences.en: It is irresponsible to let small children go out alone when it’s dark.
sentences.cn: 天黑后还让小孩子单独出去,这是很不负责的行为。

sentences.en: It is socially irresponsible to refuse young people advice on sexual matters.
sentences.cn: 拒绝向年轻人提供性方面的建议是对社会不负责任。
